TITLE: CSS - Make A Select Menu Float Above Other Content
DETAILS: How to make something flow above something else
The field is open full time for now, but the use case is when it would be hidden until some action made it visible at which point it should appear above the other content
NOTES: The wrapper is 'relative' which doesn't change it's normal position but provides and anchor point for the 'absolute' element to associate with
Per the MDN docs: The element is removed from the normal document flow, and no space is created for the element in the page layout.
